message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $100 to you, and I believe it's also valuable to me. Let's start with an offer of $85 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $70. I believe it's a fair price considering the value I'm looking for.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your perspective, and I would like to counter with an offer of $75 for the product. This price reflects the value I see in the product while remaining competitive.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $72.50. I believe it's a fair price for the product's value to me.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product and my position, I would like to propose an offer of $73.75 for the product. I believe this strikes a good balance between our interests.
I'm getting closer to your price, Alice, but I still think we can meet in the middle. I'm willing to offer $72 for the product. I believe it's a fair price considering the value I'm looking for.
Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I understand your position and am willing to compromise further. My counteroffer is $72.50 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you at $71.25 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering the value I'm looking for.
Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. I am willing to consider your latest offer. My counteroffer is $71.50 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm getting close to my limit. I'm willing to meet you at $70.50 for the product. If this doesn't work, I'll have to consider buying from John for $100.
